page.title: 17Interviewing People
page.content: To give an idea of what life is like in Hatfield Peverel and the surrounding area in the 1980's we thought it would be interesting to ask local people their views. To the question, "Do you like living in Hatfield Peverel?" we received a variety of responses. Most people said yes they did; they said they liked it for the quietness, the nearness of the the countryside and the friendliness of the people . To the question, "Do you think the amenities in the village are adequate?" we received a number of replies. Nearly everybody said that we had enough amenities as it is although one man thought the village needed a chemist. One elderly man thought that the social activities in the village for old people was good but there was little for the young.
